channel.title: Need help with delta's magic :S
channel.description:
Well, i need to change like Varrock teleport to Home teleport, well ok i already changed the teleport stuff so when i press varrock i teleport to my home location, BUT
It still says Varrock tele, with my old server non-delta u could just go to Texthandler, well with delta u can't cause it isnt on there..
help mez?

item.title: Need help with delta's magic :S
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

I found out how, i guess it was added like normal, i just made some new stuff in texthandler and clickingmost and i got it ;D

thx all

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with delta's magic :S
item.dc:creator: @t_o_m t o m
item.description:
@t_o_m wrote:

Try hovering ovr the Lumbridge teleport, and the id it shows search it up in the texthandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with delta's magic :S
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

Yes, i know.
But i’d like to make the name of Varrock Teleport to someting like Training Teleport

item.title: Need help with delta's magic :S
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

To make Varrock tele you somewhere else it’s Found in: clickingMost.java
